channel.title: Duping on my server
channel.description:
ok....so i was on my invisible admin handing out 10m to people and some guy said he duped it, then he said he will dupe with everyone....i dont even know how they do it. they are doing it through the trade interface. i want to know how to do it so i might be able to catch people in the process.
Im using deltascape source and also using a client.

item.title: Duping on my server
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

brovolll:

i know how they do they dupe but im not telling… everyone would know and they would abuse it and there is no way to fix it. LOL haha ur doomed congratz

You’re really supportive… And there is a way to fix it. But don’t ask me how, I don’t use deltascape.

Read full topic

you have to options
